stages.name: grpcreate
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper grpcreate.log 'o2-grp-simgrp-tool createGRPs --run 300000 --publishto ${ALICEO2_CCDB_LOCALCACHE:-.ccdb} -o grp --hbfpertf 128 --field -5 --readoutDets all --print --vertex Diamond --configKeyValues "Diamond.width[2]=6."'

stages.name: sgnsim_1
stages.cmd: . ${O2_ROOT}/share/scripts/jobutils2.sh; taskwrapper sgnsim_1.log '${O2_ROOT}/bin/o2-sim -e TGeant3 --skipModules ZDC -n 200 --seed 832593861 --field -5 -j 64 -g external --configKeyValues "Diamond.width[2]=6." --configFile /storage1/daviddc/k0gun/configK0gun.ini -o sgn_1 --timestamp 1546300800000 --run 300000 --vertexMode kCCDB'
